short_description: Great for Home or Vocation: Not only be a laundry hamper, but also toys/gift basket, indoor/outdoor carrying bag, grocery storage, multi-purpose pop-up storage bin. Easy to fold or pop up, the lightweight mesh permits air to circulate, eliminating moisture and typical odors. Convenient Side Pocket and Handls: Perfect for laundry accessories, detergent, dryer sheets, or any small objects, very easy to carry. Storage and Tidy: Great for saving space for nursery, bathroom, lanudry room, playroom,kids room, dormitory, camping, travel, etc. Dimension: 14"W x 14"L x 24"H. Large capacity: 70L. Colorful choice.

name: StorageRight Large Collapsible Laundry Basket Hamper with Easy Carry Handles，Freestanding Clothes Hampers for Laundry, Bedroom, Dorm, Towels, Toys, 75L, Gradient Grey
short_description: 【Collapsible Laundry Hamper】Folds flat when not in use to save space. High-quality storage basket to keep room clean and tidy. Suitable for bedroom, laundry room, nursery, dormitory, home, bathroom, balcony, and shopping. 【Large Capacity】Laundry hamper size 15.7in*12.6in*23.6in /40cm*32cm*60cm (L*W*H) with a large capacity of 75L. This hamper is suitable for storing clothes, towels, socks, sweaters, etc., and is large enough to hold dirty clothing for the whole family. 【Freestanding】No complicated setup. Simply stretch out the clothes basket, and the rigid iron wire at the top edge of this laundry bin will stay upright, whether empty or full. 【Reinforced Handles】Two handles and reinforced stitching ensure that the handles will not rip, even when the hamper is filled with clothes. The long handle design supports easy carrying even with one hand, leaving the other hand free to open doors or open the washing machine. 【Waterproof Material】This clothes basket is made of thick cotton and linen fabric. The polyethylene coating provides a strong moisture barrier so that wet clothes do not soak through the hamper to prevent leakage. When the clothes basket is dirty, just wipe it with a wet towel or wash it with water, then air dry. Do not machine wash as the coating may break.

name: BlissTotes 90L Laundry Basket, Freestanding Laundry Hamper, Collapsible Dirty Clothes Hamper, Waterproof Fabric with Foam Protected Aluminum Handles for College, Dorm, Family (Black)
short_description: [Large Capacity] This laundry basket has a capacity of 90L and measures 15"(L) x 15"(W) x 31"(H). The laundry hamper is large enough to easily hold the whole family's dirty clothes. In addition, it can be used to store various other items, including toys, books, wet towels, underwear, quilts and more, saving you space and keeping your home tidy. [Aluminum Soft Handle] The laundry basket is equipped with a sturdy aluminum soft handle to ensure lightness and comfort when carrying. The dirty clothes hamper lightweight, so it won't feel heavy even when full of clothes. You can load items into the laundry basket and carry them easily to the laundry room, bedroom, or living room. [Stand Independently] The laundry basket stands up even when empty, making it convenient for filling. When it is not in use, the collapsible laundry basket can also be folded and stored to save space. [High Quality Waterproof Material] In the interior of the laundry basket, there is waterproof PE coating, which can effectively prevent odor when storing wet clothes and wet towels. If there is dirt inside the dirty clothes hamper, simply wipe gently with a wet cloth to remove dirt or debris. [Practical Storage] The simple and practical convenient laundry basket is suitable for any age group as well as space within the home. It is a great choice for efficient storage of items and can be placed in the bathroom, bedroom, living room, baby's room, study, and any other area in need of storage.

name: Lifewit 100L Laundry Basket with Lid, Clothes Hampers for Laundry with Bamboo Handles and A Removable Bag, Large Foldable Laundry Hamper for Bedroom, Bathroom, Dorm, Laundry Room, Beige
short_description: Essential Organizer: Store dirty clothes, blankets, shoes and more with this laundry hamper. With its lid design, you can place it in your bedroom, bathroom, laundry room and college dorm. Ideal for home storage use, its neutral style matches any decor. Removable Inner Bag: Secured on all sides by 4 olive buckles, this dirty clothes hamper has a removable inner bag for easy carry and separation from the inner basket. The clothes basket’s cover design prevents the spread of odors and provides you with a tidy environment. Large Capacity: Measuring 16.9"(43cm) x 12.6"(32cm) x 29.5"(75cm) and with a capacity of 100L, this large laundry basket can hold 2-2.5 loads of clothes with ease. The sturdy and freestanding structure can bear up to 26.5lbs/12kg of load without collapsing. Easy to Install and Fold: Our clothes hamper with lid is designed with easy assembly in mind. Just insert 4 included support rods into the corners and the basket will stand upright. Likewise, remove the poles when not in use and fold for easy storage. Easy to Carry: Made of high quality polyester fabric, this laundry bin is light and easy to carry. Two handles provide firm and steady grip when moving from a room to another.

name: TECHMILLY Collapsible Laundry Basket, Foldable Tear Proof Mesh Pop Up Hamper with Reinforced Carry Handles for Laundry, Bathroom, Dorm or Travel (Grey)
short_description: BREATHABLE MESH AND TEAR-RESISTANT CATIONIC FABRIC: Our laundry basket is crafted with premium cationic fabric, engineered to not only withstand tearing but also provide excellent breathability. This unique fabric allows air to circulate freely, preventing moisture buildup and unpleasant odors, while ensuring the longevity and durability of the hamper. STORAGE CAPACITY: Our large pop-up laundry hamper allows you to carry bulky items such as comforters and coats with ease. Its sturdy build also makes it effortless to carry a load or two of laundry. SPACIOUS OPENING AND ENHANCED STABILITY: Our laundry basket boasts a large and accessible opening, making it incredibly convenient to place or retrieve your laundry items with ease. The well-designed opening ensures seamless handling and guarantees enhanced stability, providing a secure and reliable solution for all your laundry needs. FOLDABLE AND CONVINIENT STORAGE: With our foldable laundry baskets, you can now maximize your space and effortlessly store them away when not in use. No more bulky clothes hampers cluttering up your room! DUAL HANDLES FOR VERSATILE CARRYING: Our product offers two types of handles, allowing you to either carry it by hand or wear it over your shoulder. The handles are made with high-quality materials, similar to those used in automotive seat belts, ensuring both comfort and durability.

name: Lifewit 2 Pack Laundry Hamper Large Collapsible Laundry Baskets, Freestanding Waterproof Clothes Hamper with Easy Carry Handles in Laundry Room Bedroom Bathroom College Dorm for Adults, Grey, 2 x 80L
short_description: Freestanding Structure: With a sturdy iron wire frame sewn into the top edges, simply stretch the dirty clothes hamper out and it will stand upright on its own. For stability, please ensure the hamper remains upright without placing any clothes on the edge and place clothes evenly within the hamper to maintain balance and keep it from collapsing. Ultra Large: The laundry hamper measures 15.7 x 11.8 x 26.4 inches (L x W x H) with a capacity of 80L and 2 of set which easily contains 1.5x2 loads of laundry. It can hold a lot of items such as dirty clothes, wet towels, sheets, etc. Reinforced Handles: The 2 handles are reinforced with strong stitching and are long enough for carring with 1 or 2 hands. While full of items, our large hampers for laundry can also be easily carried up and down stairs or to a laundromat with ease. Premium Material: The foldable clothes basket is made from thick polyester and primuin cotton. The interior features PE waterproof coating can keep stored items dry. Simply use a wet cloth to wipe off the dirt. Do not clean it in washing machine and dryer, as doing so may damage the leakproof PE coating. Collapsible Design: Our laundry hampers for bedroom can be easily folded into 1 piece for a save space storage when not in use. It is ideal for laundry room, bedroom, bathroom, closet and even for college dorms, travel, rv, campers, hotel use and shopping.
